snippet.title: Distant Bloom - Official Gameplay Trailer | Wholesome Snack: The Game Awards Edition
snippet.description: Transform a ruined world into one blooming with restoration. In Distant Bloom, you'll explore an alien planet, build a thriving community, and unravel a mystery while healing the environment.
